title: Manohari Ruby Diamond Haaram Set - A Timeless Expression of Elegance
materials: 22K Gold. Featuring high-quality Rubies with excellent cut and clarity
surrounded by meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine and luxurious feel.
features: This exquisite set blends traditional Haaram design with modern sensibilities. The floral motifs, intricately crafted in gold and studded with diamonds, create a delicate and feminine look. The ruby pendant and earring design is inspired by the heart shape that reflects the beauty of the wearer.
colors: complemented by the fiery red of the Rubies and the sparkling brilliance of White Diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. Its timeless elegance makes it suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies like Seemantham and modern cocktail parties.
description: This Haaram set is a testament to superior craftsmanship and enduring design. The combination of rubies and diamonds exudes luxury and sophistication. With each stone set perfectly and securely, the intricate patterns speak to the cultural pride of Hyderabad's jewelry-making legacy. A heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
